CustomField.formula:
CASE( Backlog_Project_Step__c, "1", "No Pathway Yet - In Qualification", "C2", "Cancellation", "C3", "Cancellation", "C4", "Cancellation", "C4R", "No Pathway Yet - In Qualification", "C5", "Cancellation", "C5R", "No Pathway Yet - In Qualification", "C6", "Cancellation", "C6R", "No Pathway Yet - In Qualification", "C7", "Cancellation", "C8", "Cancellation", "END", "Returned to Operations",
"Moving Forward With Order")
CustomField.label: Backlog Project Pathway
